explanation:
code_hardening: Added null checks for View and MotionEvent, used final locals where appropriate, and computed velocity thresholds using float arithmetic to avoid precision loss.
resolve_compilation_errors: Implemented the existing onTouch method from View.OnTouchListener with @Override, relied on already-declared fields (downX, downY, timeDown, minDistance, velocity, maxOffPath), and replaced Log usage with MyLog consistent with the codebase.
exception_handling: none.
logic_customization: ACTION_DOWN now records time and coordinates but returns false. Removed ACTION_MOVE handling and all requestDisallowInterceptTouchEvent calls. Swipe detection is restricted to ACTION_UP only: excessive vertical deviation triggers performClick and returns its result; valid horizontal swipes invoke onLeftToRightSwipe/onRightToLeftSwipe and return true; otherwise it logs and falls through. Default return is false.
refactoring: Simplified control flow after removing intercept management, removed unused move-related logic, and aligned variable naming with existing class fields (minDistance, maxOffPath, velocity).
misc: Updated logging to MyLog with concise messages and added comments reflecting the new behavior. No new custom API calls were introduced.
